name: dampness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or state of being slightly wet, especially in a way that is not pleasant or comfortable: It's the dampness in the air that is bad for your lungs. I felt the dampness on her clothes. See
damp
More examplesFewer examplesAt the moment my garage is unusable due to the constant dampness.I could feel the dampness of the walls.We wonder if there is some dampness or condensation in the room.
